body: I wanted to point out some translation is better be translated and some better be romaji ver. Like "Nii-san" than "Big brother", "God/Goddess" than "Kami-sama". "Admiral/Commander" than "Teitoku/Shireikan/Shikikan". It's not by rule, it's just majority of translators.

Just how bad your eyesight are? Even without my cylinder glasses i can see clearly everything under 1 meter around me. I know they got blurred, but it's not that bad.
Also in the newest Monday Morning Offering they are bout to do it, so this doujin is almost official lol
@The Kingslayer its hifumi from the New Game series, not a hentai
@azninjazn  Thank you bro I came here when saw this in your recent favorite . Who is the girl on your pic BTW?? If she from a hentai I would love to watch her in action.
When I saw it in blue I thought it would be a piece of shit BUT after I read it I learned that you can't judge a book by it's cover.
FINALLY, more oppai heaven in english!!!!! praise the translator lords!!!!!!!!!
WAITAFUCKINGMINUTE! Doesn't this artist make a regular manga about titties? I'm both surprised & not surprised at the same time.
I like how Yahiro Pochi picks up from the end of Himura Kiseki's Sono book's stories with these doujins.
This one is a subjective 7.5/10 since I read the manga and actually like this blue stuff and the girls that it has.
Blue just like the original I like it
@L4MD4 thx you for the Knowledge and nightmares from your profile pic.
BEFORE ANYONE COMMENTS! The doujin is blue bc the original art is made in blue
